text: David Joshua Azrieli, (; May 10, 1922 - July 9, 2014) was a Polish-born Canadian-Israeli real estate tycoon, developer, designer, architect, and philanthropist. He had an estimated net worth of $US 3.1 billion (as of March 2013).Forbes: The World's Billionaires: David Azrieli March 2013 Forbes ranked Azrieli as the 9th wealthiest Canadian and 401st in the world.
